title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery       The Appomattox Court House National Historic Park photo gallery includes photos as the village appears today; the courthouse, the McLean house, the Clover Hill Tavern and others. Compare them with the historic photos from the 1800s.   Â                 The Historic Village, Then and Now   16 Photos  See photos of the historic village as it existed around the time of the Civil War, and as it exists today
